row.process: :SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -t "&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTERS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -i "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTERS#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX#"') :ENDIF
